item.title: 1.1.99-beta.2
item.description:
1.1.99-beta.2: Performance & Hotkey Customization

New Features:

  • Hotkey Positioning: Added a new iceBarLocationOnHotkey setting to allow users to override the IceBar's position when triggered via a hotkey.
    • The IceBar can now be configured to center exactly at your mouse pointer (X and Y coordinates) upon activation.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Menu Bar Performance:
    • Optimized menu bar item resolution by implementing batch creation of WindowInfo objects, significantly reducing expensive WindowServer round-trips.
    • Refactored SourcePIDCache to use a single batch AX traversal on cache misses, eliminating redundant per-window scans.
    • Added a scanLock to prevent concurrent AX traversals during multi-window resolution.
    • Should resolve a performance bottleneck where settings would get stuck on "Loading menu bar items..." when a large number of items were present.
  • Tooltip Reliability:
    • Fixed a bug where tooltips remained on screen after hiding the IceBar.
    • Added explicit dismissal of the tooltip panel within the CustomTooltipController when the IceBar closes.
  • Efficiency:
    • Improved LRU (Least Recently Used) tracking efficiency within the image cache for better memory management.

1.1.99-beta.1: Enhanced Identification, Customization & Tooltips

New Features:

  • Custom Item Naming: You can now rename any menu bar item for better organization.
    • Press Cmd+E in the search panel to edit an item's name.
    • Custom names are persisted across restarts and take precedence over auto-detected names.
  • Advanced Tooltips:
    • Added a new "Show tooltips in the menu bar" toggle in Advanced Settings (off by default).
    • Introduced a configurable tooltip delay slider (0–1s) for precise control over when tooltips appear.
    • Tooltips now use a custom native-styled panel for better visual consistency.
  • Multi-Instance Support: Thaw now uniquely identifies multiple icons from the same application (e.g., separate OneDrive accounts).
    • Each instance can be named and hidden/re-hidden individually.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Smart Rehide Logic:
    • The app now prevents auto-hiding while the mouse is actively hovering inside the menu bar or the IceBar.
    • Fixed a race condition in temporary show operations using @MainActor serialization for smoother transitions.
    • The "Thaw" icon is now protected from being accidentally moved into hidden sections.
  • Persistence & Reliability:
    • Improved identification logic for helper processes (like Little Snitch) to ensure custom settings survive a restart.
    • Removed transient window IDs from persistence keys to ensure stable icon tracking.
  • Performance & UI:
    • Optimized image updates with debounce and deduplication to reduce CPU overhead.
    • Throttled mouse events to further improve background efficiency.
    • Suppressed macOS AutoFill popovers on search and rename fields.
  • Localization:
    • Added Brazilian Portuguese (pt-BR) and Russian (ru) localizations.
    • Updated Italian and Thai translations.

1.1.0: Breaking the Ice

⚠️ Important Note: Due to essential internal changes in how Thaw manages menu bar items, your current icon positions will be reset to "Always Visible." I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but this manual re-adjustment is unavoidable to ensure future stability.

Localization Support:

Thaw is now available in 12 languages with 100% completion. A huge thank you to our community contributors:

  • Chinese (Simplified): by @PiCpo
  • Chinese (Traditional): by @7a6163
  • Dutch: by @SeBr28
  • French: by @PipaCode
  • German: by @Mutzki13
  • Hungarian: by @johnnybakucz
  • Indonesian: by @volcbs
  • Italian: by @zichichi
  • Korean: by @YuriHan
  • Spanish: by @diazdesandi
  • Thai: by @priesdelly

Changes and Fixes:

  • Multi-Monitor Support: Improved app menu hiding logic to correctly account for screen edges and active menu bars across multiple monitors.
  • Ultra-wide Monitor Fix: Resolved an issue where menu bar items were incorrectly included in calculations, which previously caused "Hidden" and Always Hidden" items to appear incorrectly on the left side of ultra-wide screens.
  • Refined Notch Detection: Implemented auxiliaryTopLeftArea for more accurate notch detection and added an option to enable the IceBar only on displays with a notch.
  • Immediate UI Updates: Menubar shapes (split/full) now update instantly when settings are changed, eliminating the previous 30-second delay.
  • Display-Specific Layouts: Fixed an issue where menu bar items from primary displays were incorrectly included in trailing path calculations for external monitors.
  • Performance Optimizations: Reduced CPU usage by debouncing image cache updates, adding polling delays, and skipping background timer tasks when panels are hidden.
  • Simplified Settings: Removed the redundant "temporary item delay" setting as the smart rehide logic now handles these cases automatically.
  • Thaw Bar Scaling Fix: Resolved a scaling issue in the Thaw Bar by clamping the menu bar content height and capping item height to ensure consistent rendering.
  • New Interaction: Added the ability to double-click directly on the menu bar to reveal the "Always Hidden" section.

item.title: 1.0.1-beta.8
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.8: New Display Options, Performance Fixes & Refined Logic

New Features:

  • Display Flexibility:
    • Added a new option to use the Thaw Bar only on notched displays, allowing for a more tailored experience on modern Mac hardware.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Performance & Efficiency:
    • Reduced background activity by skipping expensive timer work when panels are not currently visible.
    • Refactored the rehide logic to remove the temporary item delay setting, as the smart rehide system now more efficiently handles user activity and open menus.
  • Localization Updates:
    • Updated Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant) localizations..
    • Updated German localizations.

1.0.0: The Official Release

Thaw has reached its first stable milestone! This release consolidates all the progress from the beta period into a polished, reliable menu bar manager.

Latest Improvements (since beta 4):

  • Enhanced Reliability: Stabilized HIDEventManager logic to prevent "show on hover" and "show on click" from stopping after repeated use and prevent saving chevron divider position which could leave Thaw in an unusable state.
  • UI Polish: Condensed the menu bar tooltip for a cleaner look and added explicit double-click instructions.
  • System Safety: Improved thread safety by synchronizing access to the cursor hide count.
  • Apple Menu Fix: Refined synthetic press offsets to ensure Thaw never accidentally triggers the Apple menu.

Highlights from the Journey to 1.0:

  • The Big Thaw: Successfully forked and rebranded with a new identity, app icon, and independent bundle ID (com.stonerl.Thaw).
  • Ice Migration: Built-in support to import your old settings and control item positions from Ice.
  • Advanced Control: Introduced "Double-Click to Reveal" for always-hidden items and "Smart Rehide" strategies.
  • Modern macOS Support: Optimized for stability on macOS 26.
  • Performance: Faster icon caching, display-aware state refreshing, and thread-safe operations.

Known Issues:

If you are currently on macOS 14 or 15, please be aware that Thaw currently has some known bugs regarding temporary icons in the floating Thaw bar.

I am actively investigating these issues and will release a fix as soon as possible. You can track the progress of this issue here: GitHub Issue #1.

Thank you for all the feedback during the beta period that made this release possible!
